elements.name: To upload file in the test application with json data

steps.name: def fileLocation = '../data/jobEntry.json'
comments: # location of file, # name of the file, content-type value

steps.name: multipart file file = { read:'#(fileLocation)', filename:'jobEntry.json', Content-Type:'multipart/form-data' }
